results.title: Missed bin collections | Borough Council of King's Lynn & West Norfolk
results.snippet: You can report a missed bin using our online report form. You can now track the progress of your report through registering for our My Account service.

results.snippet: Complete this form to report a missed collection, however please make sure you report this to us within two days after the collection was due.
